Name: Paradox in the mirror
About the game: A girl who got lost in a mysterious world Escape from the chasing devil's hand and move on Easy-to-play 2D pixel art single-player action game There are only three buttons to use: 'Jump', 'Right', and 'Left'. It's difficult, but if you don't give up and keep trying, you'll definitely be able to pave the way.
